hero.heading: Driver's Guide - Driving During the Contract Period
texts: At Innolease Oy, we assist customers in vehicle acquisitions, fleet management, and practical matters during the contract. Company car driving should be as easy as possible.
Below you'll find useful information about using your leasing car and our services. If you have any questions, your personal contact person and our customer service are ready to help.

maintenance.heading: Maintenance and Repairs
texts: For the car's reliability and warranties, it's important that the car is serviced according to the manufacturer's or importer's maintenance schedule. Maintenance is performed at service points belonging to Innolease Oy's partner network. Permission must be requested for maintenance before booking an appointment.
tips: Follow the maintenance schedule and service book.
Maintenance and repairs are included in maintenance and flexible leasing.
Financial leasing does not include maintenance or repairs.
For technical faults, contact an authorized brand service center.
maintenance.note: The driver's guide is delivered by email when the car is handed over. If you haven't received the guide, order a new one from customer service.

replacementCar.heading: Replacement Car for Maintenance
texts: You can get a replacement car during maintenance if it's included in your company's car policy. For longer-term replacement cars, contact customer service.
replacementCar.note: More information about car rental – link.

billing.heading: Maintenance Billing Permits
texts: Billing permits must be obtained in advance for maintenance and repairs through Innolease Oy's maintenance team. The permit is requested by the service shop, not the car user.
tips: A permit can be requested when the fault and costs are known.
The same applies to maintenance, tire replacement and other billable actions.
billing.note: More information about billing permits – link.

tires.heading: Tire Services
texts: Seasonal tire changes, storage and replacements during the contract period. Main cooperation partners: Vianor and Euromaster. Check your contract to see if services are included.
tips: Checking tire pressure is the user's responsibility.
Replacements due to damage or incorrect use are not included in the contract.

accidents.heading: Accident Situations
texts: In case of an accident, proceed as follows:
steps: Fill out the accident report on site and ask the other party to sign it.
Submit the report to the insurance company.
Call police for personal injuries, unclear cases or wildlife collisions.
The at-fault party's insurance company compensates the innocent party's costs.
Also notify Innolease Oy's JM team or your contact person about the damage.

roadside.heading: Roadside Assistance
texts: Innolease Oy's Roadside Assistance serves 24/7. The service is basically free and costs are directed to the insurance company or importer.
tips: If the situation cannot be resolved by phone, a professional is sent to the location.
If costs are not covered, they will be billed to the customer.

export.heading: Export Abroad
texts: Check your employer's instructions. You need an export power of attorney and Green Card (not in Nordic countries). The owner grants permission. Take the registration certificate abroad.
tips: Order documents well in advance before travel.
Green Card proves the validity of traffic insurance.

return.heading: Leasing Car Return
texts: Start acquiring a new car or contract extension in time. Return the car to an Autollecom store. Fill out the return form and follow the instructions.

checklist.heading: When returning, make sure that:
items: The car is clean inside and out.
The car has been serviced according to the maintenance schedule.
Damages have been repaired or reported to the insurance company.

mustHave.heading: The vehicle must include:
items: All documents; service book and manuals.

remove.heading: Remove from the vehicle:
items: Accessories not included in the leasing contract.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
texts: In this section you'll find answers to the most common questions about using a leasing car.

questions.question: Inspections and Taxes
questions.answer: The user is responsible for car inspection and handling taxes. Partners: A-Katsastus and K1. Billing is directed directly to Innolease.

questions.question: User Change
questions.answer: When the user changes, report the registration number and new user's information to customer service.

questions.question: Insurance
questions.answer: You can get insurance company information and deductibles from the car manager. Familiarize yourself with the insurance coverage and deductibles in advance.
